history.created_by: /bin/sh -c echo 'Etc/UTC' > /etc/timezone &&     ln -s /usr/share/zoneinfo/Etc/UTC /etc/localtime &&     apt-get update &&     apt-get install -q -y --no-install-recommends tzdata &&     rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*
/bin/sh -c apt-get update && apt-get install -q -y --no-install-recommends     dirmngr     gnupg2     && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*

/bin/sh -c set -eux;        key='C1CF6E31E6BADE8868B172B4F42ED6FBAB17C654';        export GNUPGHOME="$(mktemp -d)";        gpg --batch --keyserver keyserver.ubuntu.com --recv-keys "$key";        mkdir -p /usr/share/keyrings;        gpg --batch --export "$key" > /usr/share/keyrings/ros2-latest-archive-keyring.gpg;        gpgconf --kill all;        rm -rf "$GNUPGHOME"
/bin/sh -c apt-get update && apt-get install -y --no-install-recommends     ros-humble-ros-core=0.10.0-1*     && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*

/bin/sh -c apt-get update && apt-get install --no-install-recommends -y     build-essential     git     python3-colcon-common-extensions     python3-colcon-mixin     python3-rosdep     python3-vcstool     && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*

/bin/sh -c colcon mixin add default       https://raw.githubusercontent.com/colcon/colcon-mixin-repository/master/index.yaml &&     colcon mixin update &&     colcon metadata add default       https://raw.githubusercontent.com/colcon/colcon-metadata-repository/master/index.yaml &&     colcon metadata update
/bin/sh -c apt-get update && apt-get install -y --no-install-recommends     ros-humble-ros-base=0.10.0-1*     && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*
RUN /bin/sh -c apt-get update && apt-get install -y --no-install-recommends     ros-humble-desktop=0.10.0-1*     && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/* # buildkit

RUN |3 USERNAME=astro-dev USER_UID=1000 USER_GID=1000 /bin/sh -c groupadd --gid $USER_GID $USERNAME     && useradd -s /bin/bash --uid $USER_UID --gid $USER_GID -m $USERNAME     && apt-get update     && apt-get install -y sudo     && echo $USERNAME ALL=\(root\) NOPASSWD:ALL > /etc/sudoers.d/$USERNAME     && chmod 0440 /etc/sudoers.d/$USERNAME # buildkit
RUN |3 USERNAME=astro-dev USER_UID=1000 USER_GID=1000 /bin/sh -c sudo usermod --append --groups video $USERNAME # buildkit
RUN |3 USERNAME=astro-dev USER_UID=1000 USER_GID=1000 /bin/sh -c sudo apt update && sudo apt upgrade -y # buildkit
RUN |3 USERNAME=astro-dev USER_UID=1000 USER_GID=1000 /bin/sh -c sudo apt install -y git # buildkit
RUN |3 USERNAME=astro-dev USER_UID=1000 USER_GID=1000 /bin/sh -c rosdep update # buildkit
RUN |3 USERNAME=astro-dev USER_UID=1000 USER_GID=1000 /bin/sh -c sudo apt-get install python3-rosdep -y # buildkit
RUN |3 USERNAME=astro-dev USER_UID=1000 USER_GID=1000 /bin/sh -c sudo apt install ros-humble-realsense2-* -y # buildkit
RUN |3 USERNAME=astro-dev USER_UID=1000 USER_GID=1000 /bin/sh -c echo "source /opt/ros/${ROS_DISTRO}/setup.bash" >> ~/.bashrc # buildkit
